description: http://anidb.net/ch69469 [Kaisar] after the Bahamut incident. Once the disgrace of a long lineage of knights, he recovered his noble title and his honor by helping to seal away Bahamut. Ten years later he serves King Charioce as captain of the Orleans Knights. Kaisar is honest to a fault and serious as well. His left hand is prosthetic.
name: Kaisar Lidfard
